Key Match Events: Ja Morant led a 12-point lead in the second quarter with a quick burst of seven points.
Morant was substituted out with a 12-point lead but returned later in the half.
The Grizzlies trailed 98-83 after the third quarter and struggled to comeback.
Rockets' defense limited Morant to two assists and forced six turnovers.
Morant added only three points in the clutch and struggled with passing lanes due to Rockets' defense.
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies lost the game despite Morant's efforts and defensive struggles.
Morant was the only major contributor but faced significant defensive pressure.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game saw a significant early lead by the Grizzlies which was not sustained.
Rockets' defense played a crucial role in limiting Morant's effectiveness.
